dct_title_s: The "Standard guide" up-to-date ready reference map of Washington : to accompany the "Washington standard guide"
dct_description_sm: Shows streets of Washington, D. C., electric lines and locations of hospitals, museums and government buildings.  Scale of "Standard guide" maps, approximately 1:17,000 ; scale of District of Columbia map, approximately 1:26,000.  Created for B. S. Reynolds and Co.  Maps dated 1915 and 1920.  Includes street indexes.
dct_publisher_sm: Foster & Reynolds; C. S. Hammond (New York), 1920
